headline: Jim Cramer Was Stunned by Eaton’s (ETN) Drop – And Still Wants You to Buy
summary: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer Got These 10 Stocks All Wrong. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Eaton Corporation plc (NYSE:ETN) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer discussed 1 year ago. On Tuesday, April 1 , the host of Mad Money opened the show by focusing […]

headline: Eaton Names VSE Aviation as First Authorized Aerospace Service Center in Americas
summary: ATLANTA, April 08, 2025--Eaton signed an agreement with VSE Aviation to provide repair and overhaul on Eaton’s hydraulic components for commercial and regional aircraft.
